mapper.insert: insert into zt_vehicle_his_${month} ( lic_number, tenant_id, sim_number, longitude, latitude, speed, altitude, direction, box_close, box_empty, box_up, state, weigui, driver_id, report_time ) values ( #{vehRun.licNumber}, #{vehRun.tenantId}, #{vehRun.simNumber}, #{vehRun.longitude}, #{vehRun.latitude}, #{vehRun.speed}, #{vehRun.altitude}, #{vehRun.direction}, #{vehRun.boxClose}, #{vehRun.boxEmpty}, #{vehRun.boxUp}, #{vehRun.state}, #{vehRun.weigui}, #{vehRun.driverId}, to_date(#{vehRun.reportTime}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:mi:ss') )
